name: Dreambow Maze (mcolverdesigns)
description: Dreambow and his friends were playing ball outside, when out of know where a portal appeared, and took his friends. Dreambow must jump in the very portal that took his friends to save them, before time runs out! Move with then the maze destroying bad guys and collecting keys, shield, and health in the hunt to save your friends and beat the boss at the end to go home.
